name: Paras-It World
description:
The world has been plagged by a living parasite! As the world, you have to defend yourself and repair the harm the parasite has done to you. But be careful, since all actions you take may have severe consequences and do not wait too long or the parasite may eat yourself alive!

This game was created during the GGJ2020 : https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/paras-it-world-2

Jammers :

  • Altan4444 (https://github.com/asoran) - dev
  • Azalée (https://soundcloud.com/azaleev) - sound
  • MarcRobin (https://marcrobin.itch.io) - dev
  • Sacdeneu (https://twitter.com/sacdeneu) - modeling/dev
  • Sonority (https://sonority.itch.io/) - modeling/dev
  • Sullivan BARAIZE (https://www.facebook.com/sullivan.baraize) - graphism
  • TheGoldenGui (https://www.linkedin.com/in/guillaume-font-informaticien/) - dev
